subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the origin of the Rajputs?
C_en: Spread from Rajasthan to other states
C_hi: राजस्थान से अन्य राज्यों में उभरे गए
D_en: Origin from Rajasthan to Rajputana Region
D_hi: राजस्थान से Rajputana क्षेत्र में उभरे गए
explanation_en: The Rajputs, also known as Rajputana Rajputs, originally hail from Rajasthan and expanded to other states and the Rajputana region.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान से Rajputana क्षेत्र में उभरे गए राजस्थान से वो के आगीत हैं।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: How did Rajasthan become a powerful kingdom?
question_hi: राजस्थान ने कैसे संतुलियां को बढ़ा दिए।
A_en: By expanding its territory through conquests.
A_hi: ये संतुलियां के लिए गए और इनों के सामान तथा संतुलियां के विभिज्ञा पर वाले घरेलों को संतुलियाँ के स्पाद में आए थे
B_en: Through the influence of the British Raj and the union with the Central Provinces.
B_hi: British Raj और कन्नात के मध्य कोणी संतुलियाँ के संगम से पूरी संतुलीयों को आए थे
C_en: Through the conquests of Maharana Pratap and Rana Kumbha.
C_hi: महाराणा प्रताप और राना कुम्भ के लियाँ को आए थे
D_en: Through the establishment of Jaipur and Udaipur as the capital cities.
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap and Rana Kumbha were two prominent Rajput rulers who fought against the Mughals and brought Maharana Pratap State under their control.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप और राना कुम्भ हैं, जिनो ने मुग्लों के विजनियों में का मिला गया और राना स्वादायांने विजनियों के विजीयों में का आया गया
B_en: Mahalakshmi and Laxmi were two goddesses worshipped by the people of Rajasthan.
B_hi: महालाक्ष्मिया और लाक्ष्यां हीं ने विज्यांनें का आया गया
C_en: Rana Raj Singh and Rana Raja Singh were two Rajput kings who established Rajasthan.
D_en: The Rana Raj Singh dynasty and the Rana Raj Singh dynasty were prominent Rajput kingdoms in Rajasthan.
explanation_en: Rana Raj Singh and Rana Raj Singh were two Rajput kings who established and ruled over Rajasthana.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: How many kingdoms were there in Rajasthan?
A_en: There were seven kingdoms in Rajasthan.
B_en: The kingdoms were established by Rajput rulers.
C_en: The kingdoms were established by Rajput rulers.
D_en: The kingdoms were established by Rajput rulers.
explanation_en: Seven major kingdoms were established by Rajput rulers.
